backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chat application backend with chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, image storage via blob-storage, HTTP outcalls, and access control with role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components including routing, chat UI, message handling, avatar management, lobby page, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script import for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting avatars via file upload or Giphy search with debounced search, trending GIFs fallback, and avatar removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video display, auto-scrolling message list with reply context, message filtering to hide Creator messages without media, and scroll-to-message highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog component for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL options (image, YouTube, Twitch, Twitter). Handles image uploads with progress tracking and validates video URLs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker, and back-to-lobby navigation button when in a chatroom. Includes character limit progress indicator for username editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating the app is designed to work anonymously without authentication.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with support for text, images, voice messages, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter embeds, reactions, pinning, and reply functionality. Includes emoji picker and handles message highlighting and scrolling.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component with text entry, voice recording, image upload, GIF picker (Giphy integration), and link preview detection. Handles message length limits, upload progress, and debounced GIF search.
frontend/src/components/MessageInputLink: Displays preview cards for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter links detected in message input, fetching Twitter oEmbed data and showing thumbnails/metadata for each platform.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned video player with YouTube or Twitch embeds and provides an unpin button to remove the pinned video from a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, progress slider, and automatic synchronization to pause other playing audio.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that returns a debounced version of a value, delaying updates by a specified delay (default 300ms).
Hook that extracts and identifies the first YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter URL from text input, returning the URL and its type.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale/empty chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch when the actor becomes ready, preventing persisted empty arrays from blocking lobby display on first load.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication state using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom operations (fetching chatrooms, messages, user profiles) and mutations (sending messages, reactions, creating chatrooms), plus image upload helper with localStorage-based blob storage and compression.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom, and custom styling for voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration (API key and result limit).
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Implements Giphy API integration for searching and fetching trending GIFs, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for html2canvas dynamic import logic.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas while preserving orientation, with configurable quality and dimensions.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) with caching and request deduplication to avoid CORS issues.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning support.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/urlExtractor.ts: Extracts the first supported URL (YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter) from text using regex and returns the URL with its type.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X URLs, including embed URL generation with parent parameters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password authentication for viewing and deleting chatrooms, featuring category filtering and a table view of all chatrooms.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Individual chatroom page that loads chatroom data, increments view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying all chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, create chatroom dialog, and recovery handling for actor connection issues.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme values for UI components, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document indicating a fix request to remove all caller principal checks from user-facing backend functions while preserving admin password-protected operations.
